content.question: The purpose of the note is to

choices.label: ask the recipient to pick up the child at the neighbor’s
ask the recipient to pick up the child at the daycare center
invite the recipient to attend a lecture together
invite the recipient to see houses

content.answer: ask the recipient to pick up the child at the neighbor’s

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
